input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "JAXXON"
Reference Product Name: "14k Silver Cuban Link Chain - 8mm"
Reference Product Description:
Introducing our silver 8mm stainless steel Cuban Link Chain â€“ a statement of timeless elegance and enduring strength. Crafted with precision and exceptional resiliency, this chain is designed to withstand tarnishing, corrosion, and daily wear. Elevate your style with its bold 8mm gauge and classic Cuban link design, making it the perfect choice for any occasions.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='CRAFTD Men's Miami Cuban Link Chain'
  - Name='CRAFTD Silver Wheat Chain'
  - Name='Men's Round Box Chain 2mm'
  - Name='JAXXON 10mm Iced Out Cuban Silver Chain Set'
  - Name='Miami Cuban Link Chain'
  - Name='CRAFTD 3MM Gold Wheat Chain'
  - Name='Tennis Chain'
  - Name='CRAFTD Rose Gold Cuban Link Chain'
  - Name='Men's CRAFTD London Round Box Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON 5mm Cuban Gold Chain Set'
  - Name='CRAFTD Baguette Link Iced Necklace'
  - Name='CRAFTD London Cuban Necklace and Bracelet Set'
  - Name='CRAFTD London Tennis Chain Necklace'
  - Name='CRAFTD Men's Gold Clover Necklace with Green Gemstone'
  - Name='CRAFTD London Connell Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON 4mm Tennis'
  - Name='CRAFTD Men's Gold Clover Link Necklace'
  - Name='JAXXON 10mm Cuban Gold Chain Set'
  - Name='CRAFTD London Silver 8MM Cuban Link Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON 5mm Iced Out Cuban Chain Set'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: CRAFTD Men's Miami Cuban Link Chain
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This competitor product is a men's Miami Cuban Link Chain, which closely matches the reference product's type and design as a Cuban Link Chain.
While this product is a chain, the wheat chain style differs significantly from the Cuban Link design, reducing relevancy.
This chain style (round box) and smaller gauge (2mm) are quite different from the 8mm Cuban Link, making it less relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 10mm Iced Out Cuban Silver Chain Set
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is a Cuban Silver Chain from the same brand, similar style but larger gauge (10mm) and iced out, still highly relevant.
This product matches the core Cuban Link Chain type and Miami style, making it very relevant.
The wheat chain style and smaller 3mm size differ greatly from the Cuban Link 8mm reference chain.
Tennis chains have a distinct style and construction different from the Cuban Link design.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: CRAFTD Rose Gold Cuban Link Chain
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Despite the rose gold color, this is a Cuban Link Chain, making it substantially relevant to the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's CRAFTD London Round Box Chain
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Round box chain style differs significantly from Cuban Link, so low relevancy.
This is a Cuban Chain by the same brand but smaller gauge (5mm) and gold, somewhat less relevant but still similar style.
Baguette link style is different from Cuban Link, making it less relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: CRAFTD London Cuban Necklace and Bracelet Set
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This set includes Cuban style pieces matching the reference product's chain type, making it highly relevant.
Tennis chain style is quite different from Cuban Link style, so lower relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: CRAFTD Men's Gold Clover Necklace with Green Gemstone
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is a clover necklace with gemstone, substantially different in style and purpose from a Cuban Link chain.
Without specific Cuban Link mention, this chain likely differs in style and is less relevant.
Tennis chain and smaller gauge differ significantly from the 8mm Cuban Link chain, lower relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: CRAFTD Men's Gold Clover Link Necklace
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Clover link necklace is not a Cuban Link chain, so very low relevancy.
Same brand Cuban Chain with a larger gauge (10mm) and gold color, still very relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: CRAFTD London Silver 8MM Cuban Link Chain
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This product exactly matches the style, metal color, gauge, and chain type of the reference product, making it identical in core features and highly relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 5mm Iced Out Cuban Chain Set
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand Cuban Chain but smaller gauge (5mm) and iced out style differ somewhat from 8mm silver chain, moderately relevant.
